ca.soen6441.tf.critterstd.model.tower

Class Tower

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.soen6441.tf.critterstd.model.tower.Tower
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TowerInterface, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TowerT1, TowerT2, TowerT3

    public abstract class Tower
extends java.lang.Object
implements TowerInterface
    These interface provide tower upgradation, range, cost, range and damage properties.

    Hardik
